name: NumberFieldProps
description: A number field allows a user to enter a number, and increment or decrement the value using stepper buttons.

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the current element.

aria-labelledby.description: Identifies the element (or elements) that labels the current element.

name.description: The name of the input element, used when submitting an HTML form. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input#htmlattrdefname).

onFocus.description: Handler that is called when the element receives focus.

onBlur.description: Handler that is called when the element loses focus.

onKeyDown.description: Handler that is called when a key is pressed.

onKeyUp.description: Handler that is called when a key is released.

aria-describedby.description: Identifies the element (or elements) that describes the object.

aria-details.description: Identifies the element (or elements) that provide a detailed, extended description for the object.

decrementAriaLabel.description: A custom aria-label for the decrement button. If not provided, the localized string "Decrement" is used.

form.description:
The `<form>` element to associate the input with.
The value of this attribute must be the id of a `<form>` in the same document.
See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Reference/Elements/input#form).

formatOptions.description:
Formatting options for the value displayed in the number field.
This also affects what characters are allowed to be typed by the user.

incrementAriaLabel.description: A custom aria-label for the increment button. If not provided, the localized string "Increment" is used.

isInvalid.description: Whether the input value is invalid.

isWheelDisabled.description: Enables or disables changing the value with scroll.

maxValue.description: The largest value allowed for the input.

minValue.description: The smallest value allowed for the input.

onBeforeInput.description: Handler that is called when the input value is about to be modified. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement/beforeinput_event).

onChange.description: Handler that is called when the value changes.

onCompositionEnd.description: Handler that is called when a text composition system completes or cancels the current text composition session. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/compositionend_event).

onCompositionStart.description: Handler that is called when a text composition system starts a new text composition session. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/compositionstart_event).

onCompositionUpdate.description: Handler that is called when a new character is received in the current text composition session. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/compositionupdate_event).

onCopy.description: Handler that is called when the user copies text. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement/oncopy).

onCut.description: Handler that is called when the user cuts text. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement/oncut).

onFocusChange.description: Handler that is called when the element's focus status changes.

onInput.description: Handler that is called when the input value is modified. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement/input_event).

onPaste.description: Handler that is called when the user pastes text. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement/onpaste).

onSelect.description: Handler that is called when text in the input is selected. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/select_event).

slot.description:
A slot name for the component. Slots allow the component to receive props from a parent component.
An explicit `null` value indicates that the local props completely override all props received from a parent.

step.description: The amount that the input value changes with each increment or decrement "tick".

validate.detailedType: ((value: number) => true | ValidationError | null | undefined) | undefined
validate.description:
A function that returns an error message if a given value is invalid.
Validation errors are displayed to the user when the form is submitted
if `validationBehavior="native"`. For realtime validation, use the `isInvalid`
prop instead.

validationBehavior.description:
Whether to use native HTML form validation to prevent form submission
when the value is missing or invalid, or mark the field as required
or invalid via ARIA.

autoFocus.description: Whether the element should receive focus on render.

isReadOnly.description: Whether the input can be selected but not changed by the user.

isRequired.description: Whether user input is required on the input before form submission.

children.description: The children of the component. A function may be provided to alter the children based on component state.

className.description: The CSS [className](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/className) for the element. A function may be provided to compute the class based on component state.

style.description: The inline [style](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement/style) for the element. A function may be provided to compute the style based on component state.

isDisabled.description: Whether the number field is disabled.

isInvalid.description: Whether the number field is invalid.

isRequired.description: Whether the number field is required.
